text: Mulungu anapanga Kaâ€™ba, Nyumba yolemekezeka, malo a chitetezo ndi Hajji ndi Umra, anthu ndiponso Miezi Yoyera ndi nyama zoperekedwa ngati nsembe ndiponso zizindikiro zimene amamangira pa izo, kuti mukhoza kudziwa kuti Mulungu amadziwa zonse zimene zili mlengalenga ndi dziko lapansi ndiponso kuti Mulungu amadziwa zonse
